title: EMEIA Business Operations Analyst - 11months contract
summary: Apple is a place where extraordinary people gather to do their best work. Together we build products and experiences people once couldn’t have envisioned - and now can’t imagine living without. Are you excited by the idea of making a real impact? Are you prepared to dream big? Then a career with Apple might be your dream job. We would love to hear from you! In this role, you will support our Business Operations function in collaboration with IS&T and all Operations Business Functions to triage and project managing all P1 systems issues. You will also drive RCA and Preventative measures (ensuring a 360 degree close the loop process) to further harden our systems, ensuring that we drive to our ambitious goal of Zero P1’s incidents. You will bring a strong customer service ethos, as well as superb communication and computing skills.
description:
• Partner with our IS&T team to drive for a best in class Business Operations Systems support model.
• Ability to learn how to triage and ‘go deep’ on systems issues, with a strong ability to uplevel, explain and communicate these complex issues to Senior Leadership.
• Collaborate with IS&T to Implement an ambitious zero P1 goal.
• Ensure all priority systems tickets are captured and triaged with key stakeholders in a timely and effective manner.
• Manage each issue from creation through to resolution (followed by full root cause analysis and future preventative agreements with IS&T Partners).
• Strong analytics skills, allowing for the analysis of P1 systems issues and trending. Strong follow through to drive for both Process and Systems change in these area’s.
• Establish and maintain professional and open relations with wide ranging stakeholders.
• Understand business needs and approach problems with creativity and new ideas
preferred_qualifications:
Experience in delivering supply chain technologies, a plus
Degree in any of the following areas, Humanities, Business/Commerce, Project Management, Business Information Systems Information Technology, Computer Science, Math/Engineering or other relevant fields
